sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { getSiteImages, getData, metaTags, getServerImage } from "../../helpers/api"; import Services from './home/services'; import FAQ from './home/faq'; import Collapsible from 'react-collapsible'; import Testimonials from "./home/testimonials"; export default function Career(props) { const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false); const [state, setState] = useState({ careerPopup: false, publisherPopup: false, contactPopup: false, }); useEffect(() => { getData("career-page").then((data) => { setState({ ...state, content: data.content, metatags: data.metatags, services: data.services, right_faqs: data.right_faqs, left_faqs: data.left_faqs, site_settings: data.site_settings, testimonials: data.testimonials, skills: data.skills, }); setLoading(true); }); }, []); if (loading === false) return
; console.log(state.content); return (
{metaTags(state.metatags)}

{state.content.banner_form_text}

{state.content.section1_heading1}

{state.content.section1_text1}

{state.content.section1_heading2}

{state.content.section1_text2}

{state.content.section1_heading3}

{state.content.section1_text3}

{state.content.section2_title}

{state.content.section2_details}

{state.content.section3_heading}

{state.content.section3_detail}

{state.content.section3_heading7}

{state.content.section3_text7}

{state.content.section3_heading8}

{state.content.section3_text8}

{state.content.section3_heading9}

{state.content.section3_text9}

{state.content.section3_link_text}
) }
